title: 32: The Midnight Library
itunes:title: The Midnight Library
description: Happy December! It is our last episode of the year and in this one we are recapping The Midnight Library by Matt Haig. As always the girls are sharing their thoughts on the major themes, plots and questions this book raises plus they're answering all of your questions about the book. Additionally, in this episode, the hosts are sharing their favorite books of 2021, both Readheads and non-Readheads choices. The next book is Margo's choice and she chose The Simple Wild by K.A. Tucker. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com Shop Readheads Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/collections/the-readheads The overall Readheads Rating for The Midnight Library is 4.325 stars.
